subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Swimming
Synchronized Swimming
Golf
Football
lead_paragraph: While most eyes were on final preparations for the Summer Games in London, N.F.L. camps opened in the United States and the Senior Open golf tournament began in Turnberry, Scotland.
snippet: While most eyes were on final preparations for the Summer Games in London, N.F.L. camps opened in the United States and the Senior Open golf tournament began in Turnberry, Scotland.
